Outlier Detection in Python using PyOD

The author shares their experience with predicting sales data, realizing the importance of outlier detection, and introduces PyOD as a library to detect outliers in Python. The article aims to guide readers through the process of detecting outliers using PyOD.

Key Concepts:

  • Data exploration
  • Outliers
  • Accuracy ceiling
  • Angle Based Outlier Detector
  • K Nearest Neighbors
  • outlier detection
  • simulated dataset
